name: Glissolyn
description:
It is all up to you! Save the world from an unknown plague which turns living creatures into undead monsters!  

In the beautiful world of Glissolyn strange things have started to happen.  

People in your village have suddenly become sick and reports from nearby villages of missing people have become more common. In order to figure out what it is that lies behind this sudden change, you - our hero - must set out to investigate using the intel from the people in the different villages and the different clues found in the world. 

The world used to be at peace, but since this the outbreak, chaos has erupted.  

Fight for your life against the undead creatures in a turn-based combat scenario and explore the world on your own accords! Become stronger and more knowledgeable as you explore new features and information through various quests that you set out on.  

Through clever decision-making and skillful combat, you will reach your goal.  

But you cannot do it on your own. Interact with many different characters in the great world of Glissolyn, each with its own unique background. Make friends, acquaintances, or even enemies on your journey. 

Explore the world

Glissolyn has adventures and experiences to offer and it is up to you to accept the call.

Show your skill

Fight monsters in turn based combat in order to survive and continue your quest.

Now go, hero, adventure awaits!
